original_title: Fact or Fiction: The Life & Times of a Ping Pong Hustler
overview: A chronicle of the final three years of Marty Reisman's life. A table tennis champion turned hustler. Pursuing notoriety and motivated by his love of fame and ping pong, he has to face his biggest fear: mortality.
title: Fact or Fiction: The Life & Times of a Ping Pong Hustler
